modName: SER Skyrim Spell tome price fix
summary: A simple modified spell tome value as part of the SER series of mod efforts to properly balance the economy.   This will make it harder for spell casters to obtain a large set of spells.
descriptionHtml:
A simple modified spell tome value as part of the SER series of mod efforts to properly balance the economy. This will make it harder for spell casters to obtain a large set of spells.

The current light version is a x2 modifier on original prices.

Next version to be uploaded will be custom based on spell, usefulness, availability and of course the power of said spell.

Check out all my mods!

Skyrim

Sliders timescale fix: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8289

author: MD Wolfe
